channel.title: cost-cutting on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in cost-cutting on FinanClub

item.title: GRAB
item.description: score:-23 Chances: Grab advances break-even timeline on boost from cost cuts and strong demand. Grab reports positive second quarter 2023 results. Initiatives to achieve zero packaging waste by 2040 show Grab’s sustainability focus. Positive revenue forecast and achieving break-even in the delivery business.

item.title: TSN
item.description: score:1131 Chances: Tyson Foods CEO referred to the closures as an ’efficiency play short term’, indicating potential cost-cutting measures. The closure of meat-processing plants is part of Tyson Foods’ efforts to address challenges in its chicken, beef, and pork operations. Tyson Foods’ assessment of beef price increases points to supply issues and herd liquidation, contributing to higher cattle costs and beef prices.
